examples.example: 我每天坚持练习书法，不仅提升了自己的书写水平，还培养了耐心和专注力。

translate.english: I insist on practicing calligraphy every day, which not only improves my writing level, but also cultivates patience and concentration.

examples.example: 我通过不断地练习，终于掌握了那项复杂的技能。

translate.english: I finally mastered that complex skill through continuous practice.

examples.example: 我不断地练习演讲，让自己的表达能力越来越出色。

translate.english: I keep practicing speeches to make my expression ability more and more excellent.
